title: Flying Carpet
summaries: The Flying Carpet is an accessory that allows the player to float for about four seconds, similar to the Hoverboard. It can be found inside Chests located within Pyramids in the Desert. On the [img:Desktop version] Desktop version, [img:Console version] Console version, and [img:Mobile version] Mobile version, it can also be obtained by throwing a Pharaoh's Robe into Shimmer.

The Flying Carpet is activated by holding â†· Jump in mid-air, after all double-jumping accessories are used. Once it is activated, the player is put on an imaginary horizontal rail. Releasing the key deactivates the carpet, but it may be reactivated at a lower height if there is still flight time left.
